scripts.build: $(npm bin)/run-s clean img svg css cssmin
scripts.css: $(npm bin)/postcss -u postcss-import -u postcss-color-function -u postcss-nesting -u postcss-custom-props -u postcss-custom-media -u autoprefixer -o assets/styles.css src/css/index.pcss
scripts.cssmin: $(npm bin)/cssnano < assets/styles.css > assets/styles.min.css && mv assets/styles.min.css assets/styles.css
